concept.title: Remote Debugging
concept.shortdesc: You can enable remote debugging to debug a instance running on a remote machine. To enable remote debugging, define debugging options in the SDC_JAVA_OPTS environment variable in the environment configuration file.

conbody.p: Data Collectorremote debuggingremote debuggingData CollectorAdd the following debugging options to the SDC_JAVA_OPTS environment variable, where port_number is an open port number on the remote machine running :-Xdebug -Xrunjdwp:server=y,transport=dt_socket,address=<port_number>,suspend=n

For example, to debug on a remote machine using port number 2005, define SDC_JAVA_OPTS as follows: SDC_JAVA_OPTS="-Xmx1024m -Xms1024m -Xdebug -Xrunjdwp:server=y,transport=dt_socket,address=2005,suspend=n -server ${SDC_JAVA_OPTS}"
